company_context: Braze Customer Engagement Platform Rewrite the rules of customer engagement with AI From cross-channel messaging and journey orchestration to Al-powered decisioning and optimization, Braze is a customer engagement platform that empowers brands to Be Absolutely Engaging.™ Contact Sales Start a Free Trial When technology moves fast, marketers move faster AI is everywhere—turn it into advantage. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours optimize their customer engagement platforms, such as Braze. I saw that your company is currently using Braze, and I was wondering if you're getting the most out of your investment.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Ah, another sales call. What makes you think we're not getting the most out of Braze? We've invested a lot of time and money into implementing it, and it's been working fine for us so far.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your skepticism, but our solution has helped numerous companies who are using Braze to uncover hidden insights and improve their customer engagement metrics. For example, one of our clients was able to increase their email open rates by 25% and conversion rates by 15% after implementing our solution. I'd love to explore if we can help you achieve similar results.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (still skeptical) I'm not sure I'm convinced. We already have a team of data scientists who are working on optimizing our Braze implementation. What could your solution possibly offer that we're not already doing in-house?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that you have a team of data scientists, but our solution is designed to augment their work, not replace it. DeepData AI uses machine learning algorithms to process large amounts of data in real-time, allowing you to make faster and more informed decisions. Additionally, our solution can help reduce the burden on your data science team by automating many of the manual processes they're currently doing, freeing them up to focus on higher-level strategic work.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (somewhat interested) Okay, I'll bite. How does your solution integrate with Braze, and what kind of ROI can we expect to see?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our solution integrates seamlessly with Braze through APIs, allowing you to easily connect your data sources and start seeing insights in real-time. In terms of ROI, our clients have seen an average increase of 20% in customer lifetime value and a 30% reduction in customer acquisition costs. I'd be happy to set up a demo to show you exactly how our solution can help your company achieve similar results.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (still hesitant) I'm not sure if we're ready to invest in another solution right now. Can you send me some case studies and more information about your pricing? Maybe we can discuss this further in a few weeks.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely, I'd be happy to send over some case studies and pricing information. I'll also follow up with you in a few weeks to see if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can do to help. In the meantime, I'll also offer you a complimentary data assessment to help you identify areas where our solution can have the most impact. Would that be something you'd be interested in?
